ทั้งร้อยขา
เด็ดทิ้งทีละขา"

translation.en: I'll keep looking. You have to write a story.

translation.en: but she would never tell us.

translation.en: I could write a story to trick her into giving us
translation.th: ฉันจะแต่งนิทานที่จะหลอกให้เธอ

translation.en: the final ingredient of the sleeping potion.
